### Laundry and Dry Cleaning Services - Saskatchewan
#### Tender Summary
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking interested contractors to provide laundry and dry cleaning services.

#### Scope of Work
The successful contractor will be responsible for providing labor, equipment, materials, supervision, and transportation necessary for laundry and dry cleaning services at the RCMP Training Academy in Regina, Saskatchewan. The work is expected to be performed regularly and on "as required" basis.

#### Key Information
* **Contract Duration**: The contract will be for a term of two (2) years from the date of issuance, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to two (2) additional one (1) year periods.
* **Security Clearance**: The contractor and all personnel/subcontractors working on site must hold a valid "Reliability Status Security Clearance" issued by the RCMP Departmental Security.
* **Method of Selection**: The bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

#### Commerce Agreements
The RCMP is bound by the following international trade agreements:
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Other agreements (please refer to the attached file)

#### Solicitation Documents
The solicitation documents, including the tender and supporting documents, are available for download from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.
#### Important Notes
* Canada will not be responsible for any oversight on the bidder's part, nor for notification services offered by a third party.
* Bid submission must be in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:
Qyitayo Ziwa
qyitayo.ziwa@rcmp-grc.gc.ca
#### Tender Conclusion
Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at: Procurement & Contracting Services, c/o Commissionaires, F Division, Regina, SK S4P 3K7. The closing date for submissions is [insert date]. Late tenders will not be accepted.

#### Submission Requirements
To submit a tender, refer to the attached file for further instructions. The RCMP will not be responsible for ensuring that the bidder's submission is received by the closing date. The bidder is responsible for verifying that their submission has been received by the RCMP.
